arguments.value: ERC20: approve from the zero add
ERC20: approve to the zero addre
ERC20: transfer from the zero ad
ERC20: transfer to the zero addr
ERC20: burn from the zero addres
ERC20: mint to the zero address

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@notice Version of the contract
 @dev Should be incremented when contract changed
@dev Denominator for penalty numerator
@dev A list of reward tokens that able to be distributed to this contract
@dev Timestamp value when current period of rewards will be ended
@dev Reward rate in normal circumstances is distributed rewards divided on duration
@dev Last rewards snapshot time. Updated on each share movements
@dev Rewards snapshot calculated from rewardPerToken(rt). Updated on each share movements
@dev User personal reward rate snapshot. Updated on each share movements
@dev User personal earned reward snapshot. Updated on each share movements

@dev Only for statistical purposes, no guarantee to be accurate
      Last timestamp value when user withdraw. Resets on transfer
@dev In normal circumstances hold last claim timestamp for users
@dev In normal circumstances hold last withdraw timestamp for users

@dev Only for statistical purposes, no guarantee to be accurate
      Last timestamp value when user deposit. Doesn't update on transfers
@dev VaultStorage doesn't have a map for strings so we need to add it here
@dev Allow operation only for VaultController
@dev Allowed only for active strategy

@dev Only smart contracts will be affected by this restriction
      If it is a contract it should be whitelisted
@notice ERC20 compatible decimals value. Should be the same as underlying
@dev Returns vault controller
@notice Override vault name
@notice Override vault name

@notice Change permission for decreasing ppfs during hard work process
 @param _value true - allowed, false - disallowed

@notice Set lock period for funds. Can be called only once
 @param _value Timestamp value

@notice Set lock initial penalty nominator. Can be called only once
 @param _value Penalty denominator, should be in range 0 - (LOCK_PENALTY_DENOMINATOR / 2)
@notice Set numerator for toInvest ratio in range 0 - 1000

@notice Change the active state marker
 @param _active Status true - active, false - deactivated

@notice If true we will call doHardWork for each invest action
 @param _active Status true - active, false - deactivated

@notice If true we will call invest for each deposit
 @param _active Status true - active, false - deactivated
@notice Earn some money for honest work

@notice Add a reward token to the internal array
 @param rt Reward token address

@notice Remove reward token. Last token removal is not allowed
 @param rt Reward token address
@notice Withdraw all from strategy to the vault and invest again
@notice Withdraw all from strategy to the vault

@notice Allows for depositing the underlying asset in exchange for shares.
         Approval is assumed.

@notice Allows for depositing the underlying asset in exchange for shares.
         Approval is assumed. Immediately invests the asset to the strategy

@notice Allows for depositing the underlying asset in exchange for shares assigned to the holder.
         This facilitates depositing for someone else
@notice Withdraw shares partially without touching rewards
@notice Withdraw all and claim rewards
@notice Update and Claim all rewards
@notice Update and Claim rewards for specific token

@dev Update user specific variables
      Store statistical information to Bookkeeper
@notice Return underlying precision units
@notice Returns the cash balance across all users in this contract.

@notice Returns the current underlying (e.g., DAI's) balance together with
         the invested amount (if DAI is invested elsewhere by the strategy).

@notice Get the user's share (in underlying)
         underlyingBalanceWithInvestment() * balanceOf(holder) / totalSupply()
@notice Return amount of the underlying asset ready to invest to the strategy

@notice Burn shares, withdraw underlying from strategy
         and send back to the user the underlying asset

@notice Mint shares and transfer underlying from user to the vault
         New shares = (invested amount * total supply) / underlyingBalanceWithInvestment()
@notice Transfer underlying to the strategy
@dev Refresh reward numbers
@dev Use it for any underlying movements

@notice Return earned rewards for specific token and account (with 100% boost)
         Accurate value returns only after updateRewards call
         ((balanceOf(account)
           * (rewardPerToken - userRewardPerTokenPaidForToken)) / 10**18) + rewardsForToken

@notice Return amount ready to claim, calculated with actual boost
         Accurate value returns only after updateRewards call

@notice Return reward per token ratio by reward token address
                rewardPerTokenStoredForToken + (
                (lastTimeRewardApplicable - lastUpdateTimeForToken)
                 * rewardRateForToken * 10**18 / totalSupply)
@notice Return periodFinishForToken or block.timestamp by reward token address
@notice Return reward token array
@notice Return reward token array length

@notice Update rewardRateForToken
         If period ended: reward / duration
         else add leftover to the reward amount and refresh the period
         (reward + ((periodFinishForToken - block.timestamp) * rewardRateForToken)) / duration

@dev Assume approve
      Add reward amount without changing reward duration
@notice Transfer earned rewards to caller
@dev Add reward amount without changing reward duration
@notice Disable strategy and move rewards to controller

@notice Check the strategy time lock, withdraw all to the vault and change the strategy
         Should be called via controller

devdoc.author: belbix

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

initializeControllable(address).details: Use it only once after first logic setup

initializeSmartVault(string,string,addre.details: Use it only once after first logic setup

params._lockAllowed: Set true with lock mechanic requires
params._rewardToken: Reward token address. Set zero address if not requires

initializeVaultStorage(address,uint256,b.details: Use it only once after first logic setup

isController(address).details: Return true if given address is controller

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

notifyRewardWithoutPeriodChange(address,.details: Assume approve      Add reward amount without changing reward duration

params._value: Penalty denominator, should be in range 0 - (LOCK_PENALTY_DENOMINATOR / 2)

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``sender``'s tokens of at least `amount`.

VERSION.details: Should be incremented when contract changed

_nameOverrides.details: VaultStorage doesn't have a map for strings so we need to add it here

_rewardTokens.details: A list of reward tokens that able to be distributed to this contract

lastUpdateTimeForToken.details: Last rewards snapshot time. Updated on each share movements

periodFinishForToken.details: Timestamp value when current period of rewards will be ended

rewardPerTokenStoredForToken.details: Rewards snapshot calculated from rewardPerToken(rt). Updated on each share movements

rewardRateForToken.details: Reward rate in normal circumstances is distributed rewards divided on duration

rewardsForToken.details: User personal earned reward snapshot. Updated on each share movements

userBoostTs.details: In normal circumstances hold last claim timestamp for users

userLastDepositTs.details: Only for statistical purposes, no guarantee to be accurate      Last timestamp value when user deposit. Doesn't update on transfers

userLastWithdrawTs.details: Only for statistical purposes, no guarantee to be accurate      Last timestamp value when user withdraw. Resets on transfer

userLockTs.details: In normal circumstances hold last withdraw timestamp for users

userRewardPerTokenPaidForToken.details: User personal reward rate snapshot. Updated on each share movements

devdoc.title: Smart Vault is a combination of implementations drawn from Synthetix pool        for their innovative reward vesting and Yearn vault for their share price model

UpdatedBoolSlot(string,bool,bool).notice: Boolean value changed the variable with `name`

addRewardToken(address).notice: Add a reward token to the internal array

availableToInvestOut().notice: Return amount of the underlying asset ready to invest to the strategy

changeAlwaysInvest(bool).notice: If true we will call invest for each deposit

changeDoHardWorkOnInvest(bool).notice: If true we will call doHardWork for each invest action

changePpfsDecreaseAllowed(bool).notice: Change permission for decreasing ppfs during hard work process

changeProtectionMode(bool).notice: Change the protection mode status.          Protection mode means claim rewards on withdraw and 0% initial reward boost

controller().notice: Return controller address saved in the contract slot

decimals().notice: ERC20 compatible decimals value. Should be the same as underlying

deposit(uint256).notice: Allows for depositing the underlying asset in exchange for shares.         Approval is assumed.

depositAndInvest(uint256).notice: Allows for depositing the underlying asset in exchange for shares.         Approval is assumed. Immediately invests the asset to the strategy

depositFor(uint256,address).notice: Allows for depositing the underlying asset in exchange for shares assigned to the holder.         This facilitates depositing for someone else

doHardWork().notice: Earn some money for honest work

earned(address,address).notice: Return earned rewards for specific token and account (with 100% boost)         Accurate value returns only after updateRewards call         ((balanceOf(account)           * (rewardPerToken - userRewardPerTokenPaidForToken)) / 10**18) + rewardsForToken

earnedWithBoost(address,address).notice: Return amount ready to claim, calculated with actual boost         Accurate value returns only after updateRewards call

getPricePerFullShare().notice: Price per full share (PPFS)         Vaults with 100% buybacks have a value of 1 constantly         (underlyingUnit() * underlyingBalanceWithInvestment()) / totalSupply()

getReward(address).notice: Update and Claim rewards for specific token

getRewardTokenIndex(address).notice: Return reward token index         If the return value is MAX_UINT256, it means that         the specified reward token is not in the list

initializeControllable(address).notice: Initialize contract after setup it as proxy implementation         Save block.timestamp in the "created" variable

initializeSmartVault(string,string,addre.notice: Initialize contract after setup it as proxy implementation

initializeVaultStorage(address,uint256,b.notice: Initialize contract after setup it as proxy implementation

isGovernance(address).notice: Return true if given address is setup as governance in Controller

lastTimeRewardApplicable(address).notice: Return periodFinishForToken or block.timestamp by reward token address

lockAllowed().notice: Lock functionality allowed for this contract or not

notifyTargetRewardAmount(address,uint256.notice: Update rewardRateForToken         If period ended: reward / duration         else add leftover to the reward amount and refresh the period         (reward + ((periodFinishForToken - block.timestamp) * rewardRateForToken)) / duration

protectionMode().notice: Protection mode means claim rewards on withdraw and 0% initial reward boost

rebalance().notice: Withdraw all from strategy to the vault and invest again

removeRewardToken(address).notice: Remove reward token. Last token removal is not allowed

rewardPerToken(address).notice: Return reward per token ratio by reward token address                rewardPerTokenStoredForToken + (                (lastTimeRewardApplicable - lastUpdateTimeForToken)                 * rewardRateForToken * 10**18 / totalSupply)

setLockPenalty(uint256).notice: Set lock initial penalty nominator. Can be called only once

setLockPeriod(uint256).notice: Set lock period for funds. Can be called only once

setStrategy(address).notice: Check the strategy time lock, withdraw all to the vault and change the strategy         Should be called via controller

setToInvest(uint256).notice: Set numerator for toInvest ratio in range 0 - 1000

stop().notice: Disable strategy and move rewards to controller

strategy().notice: Current strategy that vault use for farming

underlyingBalanceInVault().notice: Returns the cash balance across all users in this contract.

underlyingBalanceWithInvestment().notice: Returns the current underlying (e.g., DAI's) balance together with         the invested amount (if DAI is invested elsewhere by the strategy).

underlyingBalanceWithInvestmentForHolder.notice: Get the user's share (in underlying)         underlyingBalanceWithInvestment() * balanceOf(holder) / totalSupply()

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw shares partially without touching rewards

withdrawAllToVault().notice: Withdraw all from strategy to the vault
